description: Filtered ALFRED dataset containing only pick_and_place_simple and look_at_obj_in_light task types

valid_unseen.notes: Limited to 50 episodes per task type from original unseen set

usage_notes: This subset is intended for EmBERT imitation learning and subsequent PPO finetuning
Each episode contains traj_data.json and feat_conv.pt (ResNet18 features)
MaskRCNN features can be extracted separately if needed for improved performance
